00038 class Clamav extends Model
00039 {
00040     function Clamav()
00041     {
00042         parent::Model();
00043     }
00044 
00045     function IsRunning($proc= '')
00046     {
00047         global $MODEL_PATH;
00048         
00049         require_once($MODEL_PATH.'clamd.php');
00050         $clamd= new Clamd();
00051         $retval= $clamd->IsRunning();
00052         
00053         require_once($MODEL_PATH.'freshclam.php');
00054         $freshclam= new Freshclam();
00055         $retval&= $freshclam->IsRunning();
00056         
00057         return $retval;
00058     }
00059 }
